VideoTrackInfo¶

Overview¶

Format

Description:

Defines video track information.

1.0

1.0

rotate¶

uint32_t VideoTrackInfo::rotate

Description:

Video rotation angle. The value can be 90, 180, or 270. The default value is 0.

Description:

Width, in pixels
